item.title: End NV-318 North at US-6
item.description: End NV-318 north at US-6 in White Pine County

item.title: End NV-318 North at US-6
item.description: End NV-318 north at US-6 junction. Use US-6 west for Tonopah; US-6 east for Ely.

item.title: NV-318 North Approaching US-6
item.description: NV-318 North approaching US-6 in White Pine County. NV-318 northbound ends at US-6.

item.title: NV-318 North at NV-895
item.description: NV-318 North at NV-895 in White Pine County

item.title: NV-318 North at Preston Junction
item.description: NV-318 North at Preston junction.

item.title: NV-318 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NV-318 north. Distance to SR-895, US-6, and Ely.

item.title: NV-318 North - Lund
item.description: NV-318 north in Lund

item.title: NV-318 North - Lund
item.description: Entering Lund on NV-318 north. Elevation 5570.

item.title: NV-318 North - White Pine County Line
item.description: White Pine County Line on NV-318 North. The Nevada postmile markers for White Pine County and Nye County are at the bottom of the sign post.

item.title: NV-318 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NV-318 north. Distance to Lund, Jct. US-6, and Ely.

item.title: NV-318 North - Lincoln County
item.description: NV-318 North in Lincoln County

item.title: NV-318 North - Hiko
item.description: Entering Hiko on NV-318 north. Elevation 3800.

item.title: NV-318 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on NV-318 north. Distance to Hiko, Lund, and Ely.

item.title: NV-318 North - Lincoln County
item.description: NV-318 north in Lincoln County.

item.title: NV-318 North at NV-375
item.description: NV-318 North at NV-375. Merge right for NV-318 north to Hiko and Ely; merge left for NV-375 north to Rachel and Tonopah. This is the start of the Extraterrestrial Highway on NV-375 north.

item.title: NV-318 North at NV-375
item.description: NV-318 North at NV-375 in Lincoln County. Merge left for NV-375 North; merge right for NV-318 North.

item.title: NV-318 North Approaching NV-375
item.description: NV-318 North approaching NV-375 in Lincoln County.

item.title: NV-318 North - Lincoln County
item.description: NV-318 north in Lincoln County

item.title: US-93 North Approaching NV-318/To NV-375
item.description: US-93 North approaching NV-318/To NV-375 in Lincoln County. The route numbers are written out in text as SR-318 and SR-375

item.title: US-93 North NV-318 Jct.
item.description: US-93 north at NV-318 junction to Rachel and Tonopah (via NV-375). Continue north on US-93 for Caliente and Ely.

item.title: US-93 North Approaching NV-318
item.description: US-93 North approaching NV-318 in Lincoln County

item.title: US-6 West at NV-318 South
item.description: US-6 West at NV-318 South - Lund Junction

item.title: US-6 West Approaching NV-318
item.description: US-6 West approaching NV-318 South to Lund and Las Vegas. Continue west on US-6 for Tonopah.

item.title: US-6 West Approaching NV-318
item.description: US-6 west approaching NV-318 South - Lund Jct.

item.title: US-93 North NV-318 Jct.
item.description: US-93 north approaching NV-318, 1 mile.

item.title: US-93 North NV-318 Jct.
item.description: US-93 north at NV-318 junction to Rachel and Tonopah.
